text: was a Japanese judo player. He was the Chief Instructor at the Kodokan and a manager of the Japanese national team. Before his death, he was one of only three living Kodokan 10th dan. He was born in Chiba Prefecture, Japan. He was All-Japan Judo Champion in 1951 and 1954. Daigo died on 10 October 2021, at the age of 95. ==References== Category:1926 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Japanese writers Category:Japanese judoka
